channel.title: Posts on Pelotons
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pelotons

item.title: Badlands, Spain
item.description: Andouille flank ham hock, pastrami ham corned beef venison turkey fatback burgdoggen ribeye cupim. Tenderloin cow porchetta sausage salami strip steak pork chop short loin andouille buffalo capicola landjaeger shankle tongue. Pork chop tongue salami shankle frankfurter, capicola chislic. Hamburger strip steak doner rump ham hock short loin.

item.title: The Tuscany Trail, Italy
item.description:
BOOKED - May 28th, 2022

Andouille flank ham hock, pastrami ham corned beef venison turkey fatback burgdoggen ribeye cupim. Tenderloin cow porchetta sausage salami strip steak pork chop short loin andouille buffalo capicola landjaeger shankle tongue. Pork chop tongue salami shankle frankfurter, capicola chislic. Hamburger strip steak doner rump ham hock short loin.

item.title: The Ride List
item.description: There is a long list of places I am going to explore. Some like the Tuscany Trail, Badlands and the French Divide are organized bike-packing and ultra-endurance racing events, others like Berlin to Auschwitz and The Bunker Project are solo self-organized rides.
